entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the morning then steady. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
